price: (207) They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
